subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
lead_paragraph: It took less than a week for an arbitrator to rule that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell had the authority to discipline players said to be involved in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scandal.
snippet: It took less than a week for an arbitrator to rule that N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell had the authority to discipline players said to be involved in the New Orleans Saints’ bounty scandal.
